Text: MapQuest Membership UpdateDear My MapQuest Member In the near future you may notice some changes to the MapQuest Web Site intended to offer faster easier access to the information you need Beginning in December you will be able to save addresses maps directions and trip plans without logging in or filling out a member profile As part of these changes My MapQuest will be removed from the MapQuest Web site The My MapQuest Address Book as well as your currently saved maps routes and trip plans will no longer be available on or after December If you are currently registered to receive MapQuests email newsletter you will continue to receive our free email service full of travel tips road safety information and additional MapQuest features Your name email address and ZIP code will be kept on file in accordance with our established Privacy Policy Additional personal profile information from your My MapQuest account will be deleted from our database If you are not registered to receive the MapQuest email newsletter all of your stored profile information from your My MapQuest account will be deleted from our database New features coming to the MapQuest Web Site in December Recall up to ten addresses to quickly create maps and driving directions Save and retrieve up to ten maps with the click of a button Recall up to five routes quickly and easily Save up to three trip plans for easy future reference Do it all without logging in To enable these new features MapQuest will store information in cookies on your computer Use and storage of cookies by MapQuest is addressed in our Privacy Policy We thank you for using MapQuest and hope these enhancements will make MapQuest easier faster and more convenient If you have any questions please contact us at Thank you for using MapQuest Remove yourself from this list by either Entering your email address below and clicking REMOVE OR Reply to this message with the word remove in the subject line This message was sent to address pmguidoxivfs pmg
